lines.text: Don't discourage me. I've always fought against evil and I've always won. I'll win this time too. And I'll find that cursed witch.
That poor fool's muscles and courage will never be sufficient. He can strangle the lion, but there's no man alive who can conquer the devil.
Thank you for healing the burns on my hands. Now I can continue on my struggle.
You will never find her here... among the millions of damned... whose faces all bear the same brand of eternal suffering.

There, there is the tree that no one dare cut down. The people believe that it harbors the spirit of the witch that persecutes them. You'll have to destroy it if you want to free our village from her curse and save that poor girl who's condemned to die at the stake in a few days.
